= man; ◄ son of Manoah (מָנֹוחַ) ► judge of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= the male young of a goat (עֵז)

= a fairly small, female domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and relatively short hair, and usually found in one single flock (צֹאן) with sheep; ► raised for its milk, meat, and skin; a clean animal and therefore to be eaten

= piece of wood burning on one end; ► used to provide light or as a means of igniting something else; ≈ associated with light and destruction
= the hindmost part of an animal's body, extending from the backbone; ≈ sometimes associated with insignificance, especially when compared to the head

= tree reaching up to 10 m. high, but usually pruned to around 5 m.; its leaves are grayish green above, and whitish underneath; its fruit is about 2 cm. long and a bit more than 1 cm. thick with a hard stone inside and a soft skin that covers the oily flesh; ► its fruit is used for food and oil for cooking, for lamps, for rubbing on the body, for medicine, and for anointing; ≈ regarded as beautiful and associated with well being

Node.gloss: to rush (upon), to come (over)|to possess, grip, take control
Node.definition: = action by which an outside force (perhaps divine) quickly comes over a person, gaining control over the person or causing some immediate outcome

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= piece of cord or chain; ◄ made by twisting together strands of palm fibres, linen, reeds, or gold; ► used for tying and keeping things together
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈ directly associated with strength and power

= product of a plant of about a meter tall; its leaves are narrow and the flowers are bright blue with five petals; ► the seed capsule contains oil; after the plants have ripened they are uprooted and the stalks are left to dry for a while; they are then soaked, dried, and beaten to separate the fibers, which are then combed and woven into linen cloth
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which someone or something is harmed or destroyed by fire

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= process by which substances become soft, ◄ often as a result of a higher temperature
= material used to tie objects together or to tie animals or humans; ≈ associated with power and control over something or someone else

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching
jaw, cheek

= domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see עַיִר (עַיִר) female see אָתֹון (אָתֹון)
= to be in the initial stages of exposure to air, and thus not yet dry

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand|to stretch out (one's) right hand|to lay (one's) hand

m.definition: = hill ► where Samson (שִׁמְשֹׁון) killed many Philistines (פְּלִשְׁתִּי) with a jawbone (לְחִי)|= hill; ► location where Samson (שִׁמְשֹׁון) killed many Philistines (פְּלִשְׁתִּי) with a donkey jawbone
= location; ◄ near the border with Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) ► where Samson (שִׁמְשֹׁון) killed many Philistines with a donkey jawbone

Node.definition: = state in which someone senses a feeling of needing or wanting to drink, ► which eventually leads to weakness or even death; ≈ also used in a figurative sense to denote a longing or desire
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
literally: by the hand (of someone); hence: = process by which a certain event is carried out by an intermediary (person) or instrument (object)

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue of humans in need
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= state in which someone senses a feeling of needing or wanting to drink, ► which eventually leads to weakness or even death; ≈ also used in a figurative sense to denote a longing or desire
literally: to fall into the hand(s) of someone; hence: = process by which humans or nations fall under someone else's authority and control
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people

Node.gloss: to split|to cleave|to rip open|to cut|to rend|to maul|to divide|to break through
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities or human cause an object to split, either partially or completely, either by supernatural means or by violence
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: mortar; hence: = a hollow place in the earth, ◄ referred to as such because of its mortar like shape
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= location; ◄ near the border with Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) ► where Samson (שִׁמְשֹׁון) killed many Philistines with a donkey jawbone
literally: to come out (of a certain place); hence: = process by which liquids flow from a certain place
literally: to turn; hence: = process by which objects move back into the direction they came from
= inner person of a human or celestial being, associated with emotions, such as joy, grief, worry, courage, anger, willingness, etc.

Node.gloss: to be healthy|to be strong|to be vigorous
Node.definition: = to be in a good physical condition
literally: to cry out (someone's) name (something); hence: = action by which humans assign a name to a person or place
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

m.definition: see עֵין הַקֹּורֵא (עֵין הַקֹּורֵא)|= spring; ◄ near Lehi (לְחִי) on the border with Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) ► where God sent water from a rock for Samson (שִׁמְשֹׁון)
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

Node.definition: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= location; ◄ near the border with Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) ► where Samson (שִׁמְשֹׁון) killed many Philistines with a donkey jawbone
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
